layers.cell

Class CellLayerIndices

  • java.lang.Object
    • layers.cell.CellLayerIndices
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockCellLayerIndices

    public class CellLayerIndices
extends java.lang.Object
    Direct representation of cell layer indices. Only the cell layer and its content object should have direct access to this object. Processes should use a CellLayerViewer.
